thread.title: Northwood HS teacher facing federal child porn charges
thread.title_full: Northwood HS teacher facing federal child porn charges

author: 13abc
title: Northwood HS teacher facing federal child porn charges
text:
NORTHWOOD, Ohio (13abc Action News) - Breaking news out of Northwood, where a high school teacher is facing federal child pornography charges.
Frank Stefan, Jr. was arrested today and appeared in federal court on one count of accessing child pornography with intent to view and one count of receipt of child pornography.
According to the federal complaint, Stefan is accused of sharing child pornography videos online.
Investigators say the online postings led them to his Northwood home.
According to the federal affidavit, Stefan admits he'd been viewing child pornography on his computer for 15-20 years.
The US Attorney's Office confirms to 13abc that Stefan is a teacher at Northwood High School.
We just reached out to the Northwood Superintendent, Greg Clark. He says Stefan teaches math at the high school, and was a long term employee. Stefan wasn't at school today.
Clark says that he's not aware of any previous issues with the teacher.
Stefan is due back in court next week.
